title: MAKE IT YOUR MISSION TO GET TOXIC PLAYERS BANNED
body:
Abuse the system.
I mean it's not abusing because being toxic is against the guidelines.

But it will destroy their morale and never play League of Legends again because the grind to level 30 takes too long.
Destroy the playerbase.

Riot Games perma'd all 15 of my accounts. I have reformed and my mission is not to win. My mission is to get people banned.
I will literally bait people into being toxic.

Baiting people into being toxic is not a bad thing. It's testing people's patience.
